name: Callback
headline: AI-native business process outsourcing
description: Callback is AI-native business process outsourcing. We help our customers stay focused on their core business while we use AI to automate tasks like invoice processing, PDF report parsing, and data labeling.

founders.name: Alan Xie, Co-Founder & CEO
founders.description: Alan is the co-founder and CEO of Callback. He was previously a product manager at Microsoft and AWS and the co-founder of an entertainment analytics startup. He studied CS at Harvard and Columbia and has an MBA from Harvard Business School.

founders.name: Paulo Bautista, Founder (COO)
founders.description: Paulo is the co-founder & COO of Callback. He previously managed thousands of delivery drivers and call center agents in the Philippines holding roles like  Director of Operations and Head of BizOps. Paulo holds an MBA from Harvard Business School.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d421_features-bg-image-ai-tech-x-webflow-template.jpg)
# Use Cases
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbb63265f6e9a2483873ab_database.svg)Custom OutboundSupercharge your sales outbound by automating your custom qualification and messaging requirements. Make custom messages using our automated customer research workflows.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbdb232d24625a203b00f7_Data%20Extraction.png)](https://getcallback.ai/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbb650f89f2d847eeaf255_notebook-text.svg)AI Model TrainingAnnotate training data, benchmark model performance against standardized metrics, and perform fine-tuning on pre-trained models.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbd8a0ed88a12e82491070_AI%20Model%20Training.png)](https://getcallback.ai/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbb6b0d1d0fe6894da31bb_list-checks.svg)Revenue ManagementOptimize back office claims processing and data reconciliation for healthcare, e-commerce, and insurance. Increase revenue without compromising on compliance.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbd7ce43c3d4df23bd3fee_Revenue%20Management.png)](https://getcallback.ai/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbb6df6ea52df0b9e1ac00_settings.svg)Create Your Own WorkflowUse our platform to define your own custom Blueprints relying on AI-powered automation and human-powered QA. Leverage our library of AI Functions to accomplish any task.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66dbd9506bf747c5f216bb94_CYO%20Workflow.png)](https://getcallback.ai/<#>)
## Get started in just hours, because we're a SaaS company
01
### Define your blueprints
Our software platform transforms operationally complex processes into reusable blueprints.
02
### Execute jobs
Our process orchestration engine executes jobs based on your blueprints, using a combination of AI-powered automation and human-powered QA.
03
### Integrate results
We'll ping you when your jobs have completed. Seamlessly integrate your results back into first-party data stores and software systems.
![Screenshot of Callback software platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66cca9565fd59b013d310dd4_Screenshot%202024-08-26%20at%209.11.10%E2%80%AFAM.png)
### Start offloading processes to our team immediately using our software
### Eliminate the overhead of emailing overseas teams for status updates
![Screenshot of Callback software platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d2d5/66ccbe03ea5a6556b57a6b84_Screenshot%202024-08-26%20at%2010.38.43%E2%80%AFAM.png)
## Learn more about how an AI-native BPO works on our blog
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d34f/66de78e25feb03b8ce944727_YC%20Logo%20with%20Founders.jpeg)Introducing CallbackSeptember 9, 2024General](https://getcallback.ai/</blog/introducing-callback>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b04675c020aaf2b4a6d34f/66d2199c8d1a2474534c5510_539a10df-f669-44bc-968a-51683b4bed4d.webp)How AI powers farm-to-table supply chainsSeptember 9, 2024Case Study](https://getcallback.ai/</blog/how-ai-powers-farm-to-table-supply-chains>)
# About Us
Paulo and Alan are two classmates from Harvard Business School with years of operational experience solving large-scale problems. Paulo previously managed hundreds of delivery couriers and call center workers at late-stage startups in the Philippines, while Alan was a senior product manager at Microsoft and AWS. They believe there's a right way to build operations software, and they want to enable all companies to spend more time investing in their core business.

generated_description:
**Callback: Revolutionizing Business Process Outsourcing with AI**

**Overview:**
Callback is an ambitious startup based in San Francisco, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24. With a small but dedicated team of two, Callback aims to redefine business process outsourcing (BPO) by leveraging artificial intelligence to help companies automate their operational tasks. 

**Mission:**
The company's mission is straightforward: enable organizations to focus on their core operations while Callback handles essential but time-consuming tasks like invoice processing, PDF report parsing, and data labeling. 

**What They Do:**
Callback’s platform offers a variety of automation services tailored to businesses:
- **Sales Enhancement:** Custom outbound messaging can be generated through automated workflows focused on customer research.
- **AI Model Training:** Streamline the process of annotating training data and benchmarking model performance.
- **Revenue Management:** Optimize back-office claims processing and achieve data reconciliation across sectors like healthcare and e-commerce.
- **Custom Workflows:** Users can design their own operational blueprints, integrating human oversight with AI-powered processes.

Their software allows businesses to define processes, execute tasks, and integrate results back into systems quickly—essentially turning complex workflows into easily manageable blueprints.

**Founders:**
The co-founders, Alan Xie (Co-Founder & CEO) and Paulo Bautista (Co-Founder & COO), bring a strong operational pedigree from their experiences at reputable tech companies like Microsoft and AWS, as well as a rich background in managing large operational teams. Their educational backgrounds from Harvard and Columbia further bolster their credibility in the industry.

**Why Pay Attention:**
Callback sits at the intersection of AI and BPO—two rapidly evolving fields. With organizations increasingly seeking efficiency, the need for seamless automation solutions has never been more pressing. By automating repetitive processes, Callback enables companies to unlock resources that can be redirected to innovation and growth.

**Get Involved:**
For those interested, Callback offers the chance to request a demo or submit processes to see how their services can specifically cater to individual business needs. 

Check out their website [here](https://getcallback.ai) for more information and to explore their offerings in-depth. If you’re looking towards how AI can change operational efficiencies in your business, Callback might just be a good partner to consider.
